# The `CounterMappingRegion` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

A <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/counter">Counter</a> mapping region associates a source range with a specific counter. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

A <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/counter">Counter</a> mapping region associates a source range with a specific counter.

Definition at line 231 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/profiledata/include/llvm/profiledata/coverage/coveragemapping-h">CoverageMapping.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Enumerations

### enum  {#aef1b165905dc77f7b575797c890e9493}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="enum llvm::coverage::CounterMappingRegion::RegionKind ">

<EnumerationList title="Enumeration values">

<Link id="aef1b165905dc77f7b575797c890e9493ad1c0402f0bac0395dcc0cd8b0a5c43d4" />
<EnumerationListItem name="CodeRegion">
A CodeRegion associates some code with a counter
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="aef1b165905dc77f7b575797c890e9493a185ca3ad8ff2f6fefd469d805a2657fc" />
<EnumerationListItem name="ExpansionRegion">
An ExpansionRegion represents a file expansion region that associates a source range with the expansion of a virtual source file, such as for a macro instantiation or #include file
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="aef1b165905dc77f7b575797c890e9493abbe924008d232ccec58896a8d143db42" />
<EnumerationListItem name="SkippedRegion">
A SkippedRegion represents a source range with code that was skipped by a preprocessor or similar means
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="aef1b165905dc77f7b575797c890e9493ac031257b3294c6d8ae4afab2dd9e6edf" />
<EnumerationListItem name="GapRegion">
A GapRegion is like a CodeRegion, but its count is only set as the line execution count when its the only region in the line
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="aef1b165905dc77f7b575797c890e9493ac60b903b2cf9a177ae32a0fda7f2f84f" />
<EnumerationListItem name="BranchRegion">
A BranchRegion represents leaf-level boolean expressions and is associated with two counters, each representing the number of times the expression evaluates to true or false
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="aef1b165905dc77f7b575797c890e9493a38dd41138c2bf6c5c260dd9eac4d19a8" />
<EnumerationListItem name="MCDCDecisionRegion">
A DecisionRegion represents a top-level boolean expression and is associated with a variable length bitmap index and condition number
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="aef1b165905dc77f7b575797c890e9493a6b21d2e2f1eb9318cc7c562ac13639ca" />
<EnumerationListItem name="MCDCBranchRegion">
A Branch <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/region">Region</a> can be extended to include IDs to facilitate MC/DC
</EnumerationListItem>

</EnumerationList>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/profiledata/include/llvm/profiledata/coverage/coveragemapping-h/#l00232">232</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/profiledata/include/llvm/profiledata/coverage/coveragemapping-h">CoverageMapping.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

## Public Static Functions

### makeBranchRegion() {#ad509630daf0abb6d67adffae197b5fd1}

<MemberDefinition
